Sentencas: The preparation of high-quality yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte films on porous substrates is critical to the fabrication of high-performance solid-state ionic devices such as solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) and gas sensors.
Titulo: Dip-coating thin yttria-stabilized zirconia films for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: In this paper, stable, fully dispersed YSZ suspensions were prepared.
Titulo: Dip-coating thin yttria-stabilized zirconia films for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Particles zeta-potential and relative viscosity of suspensions were investigated.
Titulo: Dip-coating thin yttria-stabilized zirconia films for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Thin YSZ films were deposited on NiO-YSZ anode supports with the YSZ Suspensions and then heated to 1400degreesC in air.
Titulo: Dip-coating thin yttria-stabilized zirconia films for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Dense and crack-free films were obtained with thickness in the range of 20-30 muM. La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 (LSM) paste was printed on the YSZ electrolyte/anode to assemble single fuel cell and tested in the temperature range of 650-800degreesC. The open circuit voltage (OCV) of the cells reached 0.98 V and maximum power density 190 mW/cm(2) at 800degreesC, showing a reasonable performance.
Titulo: Dip-coating thin yttria-stabilized zirconia films for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The deposited thin films could be considered forelectrolyte application in intermediate temperature SOFCs.
Titulo: Dip-coating thin yttria-stabilized zirconia films for solid oxide fuel cell applications
Dip-coating thin yttria-stabilized zirconia films for solid oxide fuel cell applications
